title: Spider! : listen to the spider's song
brief_description: These quirky, gentle stories celebrate the magic of a child’s imaginative world. Pandas dance, frogs play saxaphones, hamsters sing and of course a small hairy spider is a little boy’s very best friend. Episodes are entitled ‘Frog change’, ‘Hamster chase’, ‘Panda comes to stay’, ‘Classroom distractions’, ‘C-rocker’, ‘True friend.’
